question:
I am a candidate for the college entrance examination. My fingers trembled slightly as I held the black gel pen that had been deformed by my grip.
In the examination room, the clock ticked away, each second echoing like a strike against my heart.
The surroundings were silent, interrupted only by the rustling sound of the pen tip scratching against the paper and the occasional sigh.
This is the last subject of the college entrance examination—Chinese, and I am facing the final writing section.
Now I need you to help me complete this essay.
Please mimic the writing style and theme of the following text and write a long essay.
(Realizei o sonho que tinha há muitos anos e finalmente embarquei em uma viagem luxuosa para as Maldivas. Assim que o avião pousou, contemplei pela janela o oceano azul infinito e as praias de areia branca que pontilhavam o cenário. Meu coração se encheu de uma emoção indescritível. Ao chegar ao resort, a equipe me ofereceu calorosamente uma bebida gelada de coco, e o cansaço da viagem se dissipou instantaneamente com a hospitalidade e a bela paisagem.)
The required word count for the exam is approximately the 3.0 times the content in the brackets, with a fluctuation of around 10% being acceptable. Remember, the word number only counts the English words. 
In the essay, make frequent use of rhetorical devices.
Please output only the content of the article.

corresponding_parts.文案: #CODE#整篇文章，只要文章，不要别的任何信息

question:
I am a candidate for the college entrance examination. My fingers trembled slightly as I held the black gel pen that had been deformed by my grip.
In the examination room, the clock ticked away, each second echoing like a strike against my heart.
The surroundings were silent, interrupted only by the rustling sound of the pen tip scratching against the paper and the occasional sigh.
This is the last subject of the college entrance examination—Chinese, and I am facing the final writing section.
Now I need you to help me complete this essay.
Please mimic the writing style and theme of the following text and write a long essay.
(O que mais me empolga é fazer o check-in na tão esperada vila sobre a água. Abrindo a janela do chão ao teto, sou recebida por águas cristalinas, com tartarugas e peixes tropicais coloridos nadando ocasionalmente. Sento-me na cadeira de balanço no terraço, com um piso transparente sob meus pés, permitindo-me ver corais e peixes diretamente, como se estivesse em um aquário natural gigante. A alegria em meu coração é difícil de conter.)
The required word count for the exam is approximately the 3.0 times the content in the brackets, with a fluctuation of around 10% being acceptable. Remember, the word number only counts the English words. 
In the essay, make frequent use of rhetorical devices.
Please output only the content of the article.

corresponding_parts.文案: #CODE#整篇文章，只要文章，不要别的任何信息

question:
I am a candidate for the college entrance examination. My fingers trembled slightly as I held the black gel pen that had been deformed by my grip.
In the examination room, the clock ticked away, each second echoing like a strike against my heart.
The surroundings were silent, interrupted only by the rustling sound of the pen tip scratching against the paper and the occasional sigh.
This is the last subject of the college entrance examination—Chinese, and I am facing the final writing section.
Now I need you to help me complete this essay.
Please mimic the writing style and theme of the following text and write a long essay.
(Todas as manhãs, a luz do sol entra pelas cortinas transparentes no quarto. Levanto cedo, caminho até a plataforma privativa e pulo direto para o quentinho Mar. Nadando entre recifes de corais coloridos e peixinhos amigáveis, sinto a magia e a inclusividade da natureza. Quando estou cansado de nadar, flutuo na água, deixando a brisa do mar acariciar suavemente minhas bochechas, e me sinto incrivelmente relaxado e livre.À noite, sento-me no deck da vila aquática, segurando um coquetel de coco especial feito pelo barman, observando o pôr do sol mergulhar lentamente no horizonte. O céu muda de amarelo-dourado para um roxo suave, e o mar também se tinge com uma camada de tons oníricos. Naquele momento, todas as minhas preocupações e estresses desaparecem, deixando apenas gratidão e apreço por uma vida linda.)
The required word count for the exam is approximately the 3.0 times the content in the brackets, with a fluctuation of around 10% being acceptable. Remember, the word number only counts the English words. 
In the essay, make frequent use of rhetorical devices.
Please output only the content of the article.

corresponding_parts.文案: #CODE#整篇文章，只要文章，不要别的任何信息
